revised_title: The Influence of Acid Injection on Liver Function and Urine Composition
tldr: The author investigates the effects of phosphoric acid injection on liver function and urine composition. They find that injecting acid into the circulation can cause a saccharine state in the urine, suggesting a perverted condition of liver processes. The unnatural state of the blood induced by the acid seems to promote the chemical change of amyloid substance into sugar.
